words.definition: A person who acts in films or plays.
words.arabic_definition: شخص يمثل في الأفلام أو المسرحيات.

example.en: The actor gave an amazing performance.

words.definition: A person who leads a film or play.

example.en: The director worked hard on this movie.
example.ar: عمل المخرج بجد على هذا الفيلم.

words.definition: A piece of theatre performed by actors.
words.arabic_definition: عمل مسرحي يتم أداؤه من قبل ممثلين.

example.en: We watched a beautiful play last night.

words.definition: The act of presenting a play or film.
The actors in a film or play.

example.ar: عمل طاقم التمثيل بشكل جيد معًا.

words.definition: The written text of a film or play.

example.ar: وقف الممثل على وسط خشبة المسرح.

words.definition: People watching a play or film.
words.arabic_definition: الأشخاص الذين يشاهدون مسرحية أو فيلم.

example.en: The costumes were colorful and well-designed.

words.definition: A practice of a play or performance.

example.en: They had a rehearsal before the show.
